name: The Talk of the Potluck Kale and Apple Salad
author: Dani Steinbach
summary: A favorite for potlucks, family gatherings, and hot summer nights at home. With a food processor to chop the kale, I can be done and out the door to a party within 25 minutes - and that includes 5 minutes to find my keys. My kids love this salad when I add lots of apples!
ingredients: 1 bunch kale, stems removed and leaves chopped
⅓ cup sweetened dried cranberries (such as Ocean Spray® Craisins®)
⅓ cup toasted unsalted sunflower seeds
directions: Massage salt into kale in a large bowl until kale is slightly softened, about 2 minutes
Gently stir apples, olive oil, cranberries, sunflower seeds, and vinegar into kale until salad is evenly mixed
Gently fold Gorgonzola cheese into salad
